name: Premium Business Laptop | Core i5 1235G | 14 inch, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Windows 10 Pro
description: Appreciate this laptop's smooth operations and strong performance, which is packed with innovative features. With the help of a graphics card and processor from Intel's 12th generation, you can easily perform at your peak. Additionally, this laptop's integrated 4USB connections enable you to do your tasks quickly. Fast-booting technology on this laptop also makes it possible for you to take everything you need with you. Moreover, because of its modest weight, it is portable and a fantastic travel companion.

details.usbSlots: 1 x SuperSpeed USB Type C, 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type A, 1 x USB 2.0 Type A

about: This laptop is a great choice for those who want to get the most out of their computing experience. It has a powerful processor and plenty of storage space, so you can store all your files without worrying about running out of room. The battery life is also impressive, lasting up to 10 hours on a single charge. You'll be able to work or play for hours without having to plug in!

This laptop is perfect for anyone who needs a powerful computer that can handle anything they throw at it. It's also great for students because it has an affordable price tag and long battery life. You won't regret buying this laptop!
